(A) Evidence of Erosion: Construction activity west of Canora Road is contributing a steady flow of silty water, affecting all of the stream.
(B) Particulars of Scouring: The area downstream of the trailer park is of low gradient where meandering ocours over sandy, gravelly substrate.
(H) recommended enhancement: The Sidney Anglers enhance the creek and maintain a watchful eye.
(K) Additional comments: In the spring of 1992, 1500 fry from Goldstream Stock were transplanted into Reay Creek.
